GK20mmatvipu:465: tvāṃ prāptaṃ syāt kathaṃ nāma kapālam akaṣāyitam // 16 //
GK20mmatvipu:467: savvalakkhaṇasampaṇṇadāe kamalāsaṇasīsakavālāṇubhāvassa puṇṇamāsisomadaṃsaṇassa ṇiccasurāgandhiṇo edassa maliṇapaḍasaṃsaggeṇa ia īdisī avitthā saṃvuttā /
GK20mmatvipu:471: {kamalāsanaśīrṣakapālānubhāvasya : om. G} paurṇamāsīsomadarśanasya nityasurāgandhina etasya malinapaṭasaṃsargeṇeyam īdṛśy avasthā saṃvṛttā /]
GK20mmatvipu:474: śrūyante hi mahānti bhūtāni prāyaścittair apanītakalmaṣāṇi bhavanti /
GK20mmatvipu:477: āsthāya prayato mahāvratam idaṃ bālenducūḍāmaṇiḥ svāmī no mumuce pitāmahaśiraśchedodbhavād enasaḥ /
GK20mmatvipu:478: nātho 'pi tridivaukasāṃ triśirasaṃ tvaṣṭus tanūjaṃ purā hatvā yajñaśatena śāntadurito bheje punaḥ puṇyatām // 17 //
GK20mmatvipu:481: Śākyabhikṣuḥ - {bho : bhodu C} vaṇṇo dāva mae kido /
GK20mmatvipu:484: asya saṃsthānaparimāṇaṃ {kena nirmitaṃ : tāvat katham G} /]
GK20mmatvipu:490: Kapālī - nūnam evaṃ buddhenāpi dānaparimitā pūritā /
GK20mmatvipu:491: Śākyabhikṣuḥ - evaṃ {gade : kide F} {kiṃ S : ki U} dāṇiṃ me saraṇaṃ /
GK20mmatvipu:494: Pāśupataḥ - nāyaṃ vyavahāro mayā paricchettuṃ śakyate /
GK20mmatvipu:496: Devasomā - bhagavan! yady evaṃ, namaḥ kapālāya /
GK20mmatvipu:499: Devasomā - eso uṇa aṇeavihārabhoasamadhigadavittasañcao jahākāmaṃ adhikaraṇakāruṇiāṇaṃ muhāṇi pūreduṃ pāredi /
GK20mmatvipu:500: ahmāaṃ puṇa ahicammabhūdimattavibhavassa dariddakavāliassa pariāriāṇaṃ ko etta vibhavo adhikaraṇaṃ pavisiduṃ /
GK20mmatvipu:502: : kāruṇa C}{kāraṇikānāṃ : kāruṇikānāṃ All mss.(12)} mukhāni pūrayituṃ pārayati /
GK20mmatvipu:507: tair dharmo dhāryate stambhaiḥ prāsāda iva sādhubhḥ // 18 //
GK20mmatvipu:509: kutaś cid api nyāyya{nyāya BCE}vṛtter bhayaṃ nāsti /
GK20mmatvipu:510: Śākyabhikṣuḥ - {(pāśupatam avalokya) D} bho bhaavaṃ! tumaṃ dāva aggado
GK20mmatvipu:519: eśo dāṇiṃ kavālaṃ ṇikkhivia maṃ khāyidukāmo ahimuhaṃ āhāvai /
GK20mmatvipu:520: (diśo vilokya) imiṇā patthaleṇa dantāṇi śe bhañjiśśaṃ /
GK20mmatvipu:523: {ṇāma : om. F} śūlattaṇeṇa mae śaha vi lośaṃ kaleśi /
GK20mmatvipu:524: gāmaśūgalaṃ āluhia gagaṇam uppadideṇa śāgaleṇa paḍipañjia lāvaṇaṃ balā gahīde śakkaśude timiṅgale /
GK20mmatvipu:527: ṇaṃ eśe muśalaśamaviśālalambahatthe daddule me śakkhī /
GK20mmatvipu:533: hā hā mālido mhi, bappheṇa mālido mhi /
GK20mmatvipu:536: (vilokya /) duṭṭhadālaā! jaśśa vā kaśśa vā {bhāuṇeo S : bhāaṇeo
GK20mmatvipu:537: U} khu ahaṃ, bhīmaśeṇaśśa ghaṭukkao via /
GK20mmatvipu:539: gahīdaśūlā bahuveśadhāliṇo śadaṃ piśāā udale vahanti me /
GK20mmatvipu:540: śadaṃ ca vagghāṇa ṇiśaggabhīśaṇaṃ muheṇa muñcāmi ahaṃ {maholae S : maholaye U} // 19 //
GK20mmatvipu:543: imaśśa maṃśakhaṇḍaśśa kālaṇādo mā maṃ bāheha /
GK20mmatvipu:552: eṣa idānīṃ kapālaṃ nikṣipya māṃ khāditukāmo 'bhimukham ādhāvati /
GK20mmatvipu:555: unmatto duṣṭakukkura īdṛśena nāma śūratvena {saha G} mayā {sahāpi roṣaṃ : saha virodhaṃ G}
GK20mmatvipu:557: grāma{sūkaram : sūkaragalam G} āruhya gaganam utpatitena
GK20mmatvipu:559: {rāvaṇaṃ balād : airāvataṃ G} gṛhītaḥ {śakrasutas : sasutas G} timiṅgilaḥ
GK20mmatvipu:562: {nanv eṣa musalasamaviśālalambahasto darduro me sākṣī : hanumata eṣā musalasamaviśālalambahaste dardure me śaktiḥ G} /
GK20mmatvipu:564: trailokyaviditaparākramasya sākṣiṇā kiṃ kāryam : athavā kiṃ mama
GK20mmatvipu:572: : duṣṭadārakabhartāra! vāsudevasya bhāgi G}! yasya vā kasya vā bhāgineyaḥ khalv ahaṃ, bhīmasenasya ghaṭotkaca iva /
GK20mmatvipu:574: gṛhītaśūlā bahuveṣadhāriṇaḥ śataṃ piśācā udare {vahanti : vasanti G} me /
GK20mmatvipu:575: śataṃ ca vyāghrāṇāṃ nisargabhīṣaṇaṃ mukhena muñcāmy ahaṃ mahoragān // 19 //
GK20mmatvipu:576: kathaṃ {māṃ bādhante : punar api māṃ tāḍayanti G} /
GK20mmatvipu:577: prasīdantu prasīdantu dārakabhartāraḥ! asya māṃsakhaṇḍasya kāraṇād mā māṃ {bādhadhvam :
GK20mmatvipu:581: Pāśupata - aye! ayam unmattakaḥ ita evābhivartate /
GK20mmatvipu:583: nirviṣṭojjhitacitracīvaradharo rūkṣair nitāntākulaiḥ keśair uddhatabhasma{pāṃsu : pāṇḍu D}nicayair nirmālya{mālākulaiḥ :
GK20mmatvipu:585: ucchiṣṭāśanalolupair balibhujām anvāsyamāno gaṇair bhūyān grāmakasārasañcaya iva bhrāmyan manuṣyākṛtiḥ // 20 //
GK20mmatvipu:586: Unmattakaḥ - {(pāśupatam avalokya) CDE} jāva ṇaṃ uvaśappāmi /
GK20mmatvipu:588: mahāśāhuṇo caṇḍālakukkulaśśa śaāśādo ahiadaṃ edaṃ {kavālaṃ : om. D}
GK20mmatvipu:599: Unmattakaḥ - (kapālinam upagamya kapālaṃ bhūmau nikṣipya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pādayoḥ patitvā) mahādeva! kalīadu paśādo /
GK20mmatvipu:606: Kapālī - bhagavatprasādāt punar api kapālī saṃvṛttaḥ /
GK20mmatvipu:611: Kapālī - (anusṛtya) {eṣa : hanta C : kaṣṭam eṣa E} yamapuruṣo me jīvitaṃ
GK20mmatvipu:624: Unmattakaḥ - mūḍha! ki ṇa pekkhaśi, śuvaṇṇabhāaṇaṃ khu edaṃ /
GK20mmatvipu:625: [mūḍha! kiṃ na paśyasi, suvarṇabhājanaṃ khalv etat /]
GK20mmatvipu:627: Unmattakaḥ - ediṇā śuvaṇṇavaṇṇapaḍāvudeṇa śuvaṇṇakārāvuttaeṇa kidaṃ tti bhaavaṃ /
GK20mmatvipu:629: [etena suvarṇavarṇapaṭāvṛtena suvarṇa{kārāvuttena : kāreṇa G} kṛtam iti bhagavan /
GK20mmatvipu:633: Unmattakaḥ - ummattao tti bahuśo edaṃ śaddaṃ śuṇomi /
GK20mmatvipu:651: ciraṃ mayā caritam akhaṇḍitaṃ tapo maheśvare bhagavati bhaktir {asti : astu C} me /
GK20mmatvipu:652: tirohitaḥ sa tu sahasā sukhena nas tvam adya yat kuśali kapāla dṛśyase // 21 //
GK20mmatvipu:653: Devasomā - bhaavaṃ! candasamāgadaṃ via paosaṃ bhaavantaṃ pekkhantīe ajja
GK20mmatvipu:655: [bhagavan! candrasamāgatam iva pradoṣaṃ bhagavantaṃ paśyatyā adyānandatīva
GK20mmatvipu:662: : om. CD} ayam adya {bhikṣur : om. D} vyāghramukhāt {katham api E}
GK20mmatvipu:664: (prakāśam /) yāvad aham idānīm eva suhṛdabhyudayakṛtam ānandaṃ purodhāya bhagavataḥ {pūrva : pūrvaṃ KaA(17)}{sthalī : sthala
GK20mmatvipu:665: C}nivāsino {dhūma : dhūmra H}velāṃ {pratipālayāmi : sambhāvayāmi C}/ ayaṃ cādyaprabhṛti -
GK20mmatvipu:669: Kapālī - bho nāgasena! yan mayāparādhaḥ kṛtaḥ, tat prasannahṛdayaṃ tvam
GK20mmatvipu:675: Kapālī - yadi me bhagavān prasannaḥ, kim ataḥ param aham icchāmi /
GK20mmatvipu:685: śaśvad bhūtyai prajānāṃ vahatu vidhihutām āhutiṃ jātavedā vedān viprā bhajantāṃ surabhiduhitaro bhūridohā bhavantu /
GK20mmatvipu:686: udyuktaḥ sveṣu dharmeṣv ayam api vigatavyāpad ācandratāraṃ rājanvān astu śaktipraśamitaripuṇā śatrumallena lokaḥ // 23 //
GK20mmatvipu:690: (1) Note by Sastri, also printed in Unni's edition: karotīty adhyāhartavyam /
GK20mmatvipu:692: (3) Note by Sastri (shortened in Unni 1998): argheti mūlyaprāptyarthako dhātuḥ /
GK20mmatvipu:694: bahu arghanti bahu mūlyaṃ prāpnuvanti ślāghām analpāṃ labhanta iti yāvat /
GK20mmatvipu:695: yaḥ svayaṃ guṇottarasūktiratnanidhiḥ san parakīyasūktāny alpaguṇāny api nāvamanyate, pratyuta ślāghata eva
GK20mmatvipu:697: yasminn iti vaiṣayike sāmīpike vādhikaraṇe saptamī
GK20mmatvipu:698: (4) Or does H omit pātrahastaḥ only? Unni's note is ambiguous.
GK20mmatvipu:699: (5) Or is it upādhaassa in K? The note in my edition is not clearly ligible.
GK20mmatvipu:700: (6) Unni does not make clear what the akṣara gha is substituted for or where it is inserted.
GK20mmatvipu:702: (8) Brackets in both Unni's and Sastri's editions.
GK20mmatvipu:705: (11) Unni records the very same gṛhṇātu as a variant.
GK20mmatvipu:706: (12) According to Unni. Sastri does not record any variant.
GK20mmatvipu:708: (14) Unni prints (part of) the commentary in G: grāmasūkaraḥ kukkuraḥ,
GK20mmatvipu:709: tasya galaṃ kaṇṭham; gaganam utpatitena mayā śvagaṇena saha airāvataṃ
GK20mmatvipu:710: pratibhañjya gṛhītaḥ sasutas timiṅgila iti unmattapralāpaḥ /
GK20mmatvipu:711: (15) G comments: pūjayāmi; asya nayiṣye kapālam iti śeṣaḥ /
GK20mmatvipu:714: (18) No siglum added in Unni's note.
